TopicTitle: Build a predator Drone that can fly

Articles.Content:
I tried and it wouldn't stay stable

stupid KSP aerodynamics...

so i want to see if anyone can build a Predator Drone

Hint: Use google Images as a reference

Score will be based on

1. how well it flies

2. functionality

3. does it look like the real thing

max score is 30

No mods (excluding propellers) (including Mechjeb)

You can use a jet engine if you want

Good luck

Leader board: zarakon-28

Edited June 1, 2013 by Penguinhero

You want it to look like the real thing and flies well, but no mods? There isn't even a propeller engine in stock.

I have a challenge for you, build a working light saber with 2 meter pats, gotta look like the real thing, including size.
So basically you are looking for a ship. This is not a challange, but a request

So basically you are looking for a ship. This is not a challange, but a request

it is a challenge i was just saying i failed and that is what made me think of the challenge in the first place. i didn't ask for download links now did i?
We get too many "challenges" that are really "please make this ship for me". Maybe there should be a "requests" board.

Hey Penguinhero,

In most cases, a sucessful challenge will have a clearly defined goal, as well as a good scoring metric.

[thread=24898]This[/thread] post has some really good pointers on what often turn out to be successful challenges. In my opinion, the main question to ask when making a challenge is "Am I making a game that other folks will have fun playing?"

Also, taking a little time and working on the presentation can go a long way.

As it's looking right now, you might not get a whole lot of participation, but that's how challenges go sometimes.

Just threw this together

All stock, flies pretty well (with avionics enabled), and includes two accurate short-range missiles

Download:

https://docs.google.com/file/d/0Bz_Zk5oTok77ZXE5UjhSRGkwa0E/edit?usp=sharing

Intakes and power are hidden inside the front of it

Zarakon you are great

FYI I didn't want the download link...
But how can you see how well it flies if you don't try it?
I have made one but with the p-wing and the fire spitter pack i could try to make one stock.
